name: Saul Williams / poster
description: This is a print of illustration for musician Saul Williams. Original artwork is hand-drawn with india ink and aquarel on white paper. You can see more images here. Each print is hand-signed by the artist, numbered and sold in limited edition of 100 prints, printed on high quality paper. Poster is packaged in safe carton tube. Size: 17.5 x 28 in (44 x 70 cm) Similar artworks at my website.

name: Philip Glass (shapes) / poster
description: This is a digitally created illustration of a composer Philip Glass. Structure of sharp shapes in a grayscale describes his repetitive approach to music. More photos here: www.peraic.com Each print is hand-signed by the artist, numbered and sold in limited edition of 100 prints, printed on high quality paper. Poster is packaged in safe carton tube.
